scr.name: CAR SPAWNER
scr.desc: features all of game vehicles, spawn what you want and where you want; has ibuilt vehicle preview; activation using CLEO menu.

scr.name: CHEATS
scr.desc: features all standard cheats; activation using CLEO menu.

scr.name: HEALTH REGEN
scr.desc: constantly regenerates few player's HP every second; autostart.
